pack.all_rapiers_3D.title: Rapiers 3D
skill.refm.deadlybackflip.tooltip:
Rush in to your enemy kicking him to do a backflip.
After the backflip rush into your enemy a second time to give him a lethal stab.
skill.refm.deadlybackflip_amethyst.toolt:
Rush in to your enemy kicking him going high with magic.
After that you will rush with the ancient mana collected inside the amethyst to behind your enemies armor.
skill.refm.deadlybackflip_ender.tooltip:
Rush in to your enemy kicking him to go into a end portal.
After entering the portal you will use the end lost energy to shatter your enemy in pieces.
skill.refm.deadlybackflip_ocean.tooltip:
Rush in to your enemy kicking him and gaining the height of the rain.
After you reach the sky you will make sure that the rain on your blade will puncture into your enemy's armor.
skill.refm.deadlybackflip_wither.tooltip:
Rush in to your enemy kicking him and smelling his death wishes.
After listening to your victim, you will please his wishes in the most demonic and brutal way.
